attr.mechanism of action: complex life cycle with sexual reproduction in felids and asexual replication in intermediate hosts

reference: Companion Animal Parasite Council. Toxoplasma gondii. https://capcvet.org/guidelines/toxoplasma-gondii/

attr.source: rapidly dividing stage of T. gondii

attr.mechanism of action: persist in tissue cysts for life of host
